label: 藤原敦光
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1063-1144). Son of Akihira. Younger brother of Atsumoto. Uncle of Chikamitsu and Shigeaki. Erudite" of literature. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (65), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (6), and Wakan kensakushū (2). Waka in Kin'yōshū (2) and Wakan kensakushū (1). Wrote a Kakinomoto no Hitomaro eiguki 柿本人麿影供記 (1118). Comp. Honchō teiki 本朝帝紀, Zoku honchoō shūku 続本朝秀句 (the latter at Tadamichi's request; both lost). [明衡、敦基、周光、茂明、漢詩、和漢兼作集、和歌、金葉集、忠通] "
